markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Powerful Guts](/Feats.aspx?ID=2523) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your stomach is particularly durable. When you succeed at a Fortitude save to reduce your [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) value, you reduce it by 2 (or by 3 on a critical success).
name: Powerful Guts
